comment:
6.6 gal. of runnings at 1.047 = 310.2 gravity points
5.5 gal x 1.061 = 335.5 gravity points
25.3 points less than expected.
310.2 / 5.5 = 1.056 expected OG

Strike grains with 4.41 gal of water at 167.3 °F.
Mash at 155 °F for 75 min.
Vorlauf and lauter 2.66 gal in your first runnings.
Add 3.94 gal of sparge water at 168 °F.
Vorlauf and lauter 3.94 gal in your second runnings.
Your combined runnings should be 6.6 gal.
Racked to secondary and dry hopped on 4/13.
